errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: Since the VM version paris, "difficulty" was replaced by "prevrandao", which now returns a random number based on the beacon chain.
  --> contracts/CommonVulnerabilities/DAY-3-Randomness/Random/ToAttackRandom.sol:23:88:

23 |         numberToGuess = uint(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp, block.number, block.difficulty)));
   |                                                                                        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
